f-spacer.title: f-spacer
f-spacer.description: Used to create space between elements, align items, etc in f-div

size.description: Size of the spacer, you can use system values or enter numeric value (eg: 200px)

large.description: Used for log views, code snippets.

medium.description: Used for log views, code snippets.

small.description: Used for log views, code snippets.

x-small.description: Used for log views, code snippets.

num.description: Replace num with a numeric value (eg: 200px).
